title.narrative: HelpAge- Horn of Africa Emergency Response

description.narrative: The project highlights the needs and capacities of displaced older people in the region so that the international humanitarian community does not overlook their needs.

Works with local partners and NGOs to ensure older people get access to appropriate emergency food aid and safe water in drought stricken households in Ethiopia and Northern Eastern Kenya.
In response to drought crisis, HelpAge provides direct cash transfers to older people to purchase food for their family and provide livestock feed for their animals.
Distributes portable water storage equipment and water purification tablets to older people and is currently constructing latrines.
Form community health centers that are accessible to older people and distribute mobility aids to ensure older people can reach available aid, sanitation, and shelter.
Raise fund to mount a response to support drought-affected older people in Ethiopia, Somalia and Kenya.
